text: VS Joy (Malayalam: വി .എസ് ജോയി) (born 23 November 1985) is an Indian politician and current General Secretary KPCC of Kerala State Former state president of Kerala Students Union (KSU) and Ex. Convener of State Campaign Committee of Kerala Pradesh Congress Committee (KPCC), Kerala and a member of the Indian National Congress. He contested from Malampuzha Assembly constituency in Kerala Assembly elections. ==Political life== Hailing from a Congress family, V.S Joy has held various positions within the party. *State president of the Kerala Students Union (KSU) from 2011–2016 *General Secretary, Kerala Pradesh Congress Committee (KPCC) (Present) ==References== ==External links== *Official Website VS Joy * Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Malayali politicians Category:Kerala politicians
title: V.S. Joy
